page.title: 19Clubs in Paulton.
page.content: {Sports Clubs.} Paulton Rovers Football Club and Social Club.Purnells _ Clubs for Cricket,Tennis,Bowls,Angling,Squash, Football. Swimming Club,Badminton Club, Skittles League,Darts League. {Woman's Groups. Youth Groups.} Mother's Union, Brownies, Bright Hour, Guides, Women's Fellowship, Cubs, Women's League, Scouts, Ladies Club, Army Cadets, Ladies Darts League, Youth Club, Women's Institute, Durham Boys Club Wives'Circle, Youth Band. { Other Clubs.} Cam Valley Wildlife Trust, Horticultural Society, Parent Teacher Association. { { }
